original_text:
about the well that the princes dug,
    that the nobles of the people sank—
    the nobles with scepters and staffs.”
Then they went from the wilderness to Mattanah,
korean_text: 이 우물은 지휘관들이 팠고 백성의 귀인들이 규와 지팡이로 판 것이로다 하였더라 그들은 광야에서 맛다나에 이르렀고

sentences.original_text: about the well that the princes dug
that the nobles of the people sank
the nobles with scepters and staffs
Then they went from the wilderness
